_notes: Used by Process L to fetch full map extension detail for the selected map
No request body is required — this is a direct GET by ID
mapExtensionId is obtained from the EnvironmentMapExtensionsSummary query (see query-map-extensions-summary.json)
Response includes full Mapping and Function arrays for display and editing in the Flow UI
WARNING: The update operation (see update-map-extension.json) requires ALL extensible fields
_comment: GET request — no request body needed. Use URL path: /EnvironmentMapExtension/{mapExtensionId}
_usage: Process L fetches map extension detail using the ID obtained from EnvironmentMapExtensionsSummary query
